890020.name: Animallica - Official Soundtrack
890020.description:
The Official Soundtrack for Animallica takes you on an epic journey from the grasses of the African Savannah, Alpine mountains, Egyptian deserts and Asian-themed gardens to the dangers of of the infested city Culsberg and the mutant factory in Pestilentia.

The Animallica Official Soundtrack was created in order to support the talented composer that created it, Matthew Harper.

All the tracks combined offer 101+ minutes of audition, in mp3 format, 320 kbps, 253 MB total size.
We will constantly update the soundtrack, with every new biome that we add in the game.

Track list:


01. Animalica Main Theme - 3.41 - Matthew Harper
02. Akhali Desert - 4.22 - Matthew Harper
03. Amber Forest - 4.28 - Matthew Harper
04. Burning Sands - 9.00 - Matthew Harper
05. Corpse Harbor - 4.36 - Matthew Harper
06. Cultsberg - 6.51 - Matthew Harper
07. Dahm Bah - 5.04 -Matthew Harper
08. Eagles Nest - 6.44 - Matthew Harper
09. Kitsune's Den - 4.39 - Matthew Harper
10. Pestilentia - 9.34 - Matthew Harper
11. Red Mountains - 7.04 - Matthew Harper
12. Sliceland - 10.22 - Matthew Harper
13. Sun Torinos - 7.57 - Matthew Harper
14. Inside the Pyramid - 4.08 - Matthew Harper
15. Out of the Bunker - 6.50 - Matthew Harper
16. The Facility - 2.43 - Matthew Harper
17. Battle Theme 1 - 3.24 - Matthew Harper
18. Battle Theme 2 - 3.22 - Matthew Harper
19. Beauty and Wonder - 0.07 - Matthew Harper
